Security Token Offering.

Security Token Offering is the process of digital assets issuance in full compliance with the requirements
of the security legislation

STO has a plenty of advantages over ICO:

Secure Market Conditions

All the investments and rights of market players are protected by legal authorities

Accredited Investors

Only official and trustworthy investors will have an access for your tokens

Securitized  assets

STO tokens are more attractive for investors because of their legal essence

Expanding Niche

STO market is in phase of growth. There is a great opportunity to collect a big hard cap

Equity Control

You can easily manage your equity issuance on the start of STO
